Overall most impressed with @SarahBoyack fact-based, student centered answers, @AlisonJohnstone also had v strong thought out responses.
Omg SNP candidate "private blocks have turned out to be expensive" yes so regulate it, don't make unis subsidize their profits #eusaspdebate
Panel for #eusaspdebate. Nice to see gender balance! Good job moderating @eusavpaa https://t.co/1md6colXem
Hoorah, greens now explicitly saying they are for summer student support #eusaspdebate
"We've maintained bursary support" what?! Have you looked at your own saas reports? Bursaries for the poorest been cut by 35% #eusaspdebate
50% of students who drop out of education do so over the summer months #eusaspdebate
Sarah boyack (labour) and Martin (lib Dems) specifically mentioned need for supporting students in summer. Woop! #eusaspdebate
Yes, students are going for private purpose accommodation bc there's nothing else left! That's why they need to be regulated! #eusaspdebate
Private purpose built student housing isn't regulated at all, charges over Â£600/room on average. Needs affordability regs! #eusaspdebate
it's a shame I can't support lib dem policies - @Martin_Veart is prob most personally genuine candidate Ive met this election #eusaspdebate
"Highest level of support" but grants have been cut by 35% and loana increased by 65% #eusaspdebate
Aw @SarahBoyack was at Eusa event on mental health a few weeks ago. Knows how to curry the local constituency favour â¤ï¸
@Martin_Veart @eusa don't worry! There's a spot waiting for you whenever you manage to get here!
Great to hear @SarahBoyack citing facts about private student housing, summer support, and co-ops we chatted about last week! #eusaspdebate
